api_list.name: news
api_list.description: Returns 20 news. It uses pagination system.

required_parameters.name: pagination_id
required_parameters.description: Pagination id from last query. Unless specified it will return the first 20 articles.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://news-api-poland.p.rapidapi.com/news/0"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-api-poland.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://news-api-poland.p.rapidapi.com/news/{pagination_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-api-poland.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
